page.title: 15CLUBS and EMPLOYMENT
page.content: {WOMENS INSTITUTE}Branch founded 1952, part of national organisation for women of all ages. 22 members hold monthly meetings in Village Hall+ guest speaker. Organised by committee of 8 members, regular fund raising events within village, visits to theatres and other places of general interest. {EMPLOYMENT}In the village there are: 4 farm workers,5 domestics,1 computer consultant,1 hairdresser,1 self employed,1 parish clerk, 2 nannies, 1 gardener. Outside the village are: 2 bankers,2 legal experts,2 civil engineers,1 marine engineer,7 private businesses,1 interior decorator,1 pilot,1 radiographer,1 flower arranger ,2 local government officers,1 insurance broker,1 heavy goods vehicle driver,3 television executives,2 technicians,3 secretaries,1 cricketer.
